TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Payuwan, title = Payuwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Payuwan} }

S.FORM: alang Payuwan ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Maka go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 156 buwan, 531 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 98% kyan ku 518 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 2% kyan ku 13 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 91%, Rukay 1%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Payuwan hya' ga Kazangiljan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Payowan ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Maka go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 156 bowan, 531 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 98% kyan ko 518 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 2% kyan ko 13 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 91%, Rokay 1%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Payowan hya' ga Kazangiljan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
